languages.text: "Какой позор для Дитя Азуриана — быть для зевак мон-кай лишь зверьком на потеху".

traits.locale_text: "Кхмер-ша ун брас'кхор до... Какой позор для Дитя Азуриан — быть для зевак мон-кай лишь зверьком на потеху".

languages.text: "Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."
languages.original_text: "Какой позор для Дитя Азуриана — быть для зевак мон-кай лишь зверьком на потеху".

traits.locale_text: "Khmer-sha un bras'khor do... Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."
"Khmer-sha un bras'khor do... Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."
"Khmer-sha un bras'khor do... Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."
"Khmer-sha un bras'khor do... Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."

languages.text: “对于阿苏焉的子嗣而言，这是何等的羞辱。成为猴子观赏的对象，沦为他们的笑柄。”
languages.original_text: "Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."

traits.locale_text: “喀米尔-沙-乌恩-布拉斯霍-多尔……对于阿苏焉的子嗣而言，这是何等的羞辱。成为猴子观赏的对象，沦为他们的笑柄。”
“喀米尔-沙-乌恩-布拉斯霍-多尔……对于阿苏焉的子嗣而言，这是何等的羞辱。成为猴子观赏的对象，沦为他们的笑柄。”

languages.text: «Es una humillación terrible para una hija de Asuryan quedar reducida a una bestia para la admiración de los mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."

traits.locale_text: «Es una humillación terrible para una hija de Asuryan quedar reducida a una bestia para la admiración de los mon-keigh».

languages.text: 「アシュリアンの御子にはひどい屈辱だ。モン＝ケイにじろじろ見られる獣にしかなれぬとは」
languages.original_text: "Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."

traits.locale_text: 「アシュリアンの御子にはひどい屈辱だ。モン＝ケイにじろじろ見られる獣にしかなれぬとは」

languages.text: « Quelle humiliation pour une enfant d'Asuryan de se voir réduite à l'état de bête de foire livrée en pâture aux regards bovins de ces mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."

traits.locale_text: « Khmer-sha un bras'khor do... Quelle humiliation pour une enfant d'Asuryan de se voir réduite à l'état de bête de foire livrée en pâture aux regards bovins de ces mon-keigh. »

languages.text: "Welch Erniedrigung für ein Kind von Asuryan, nur eine Bestie zu sein, die Chem-Pan-Sey anstarren."
languages.original_text: "Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."

traits.locale_text: "Khmer-sha un bras'khor do ... Welch Erniedrigung für ein Kind von Asuryan, nur eine Bestie zu sein, die Chem-Pan-Sey anstarren."

languages.text: "Mon-keighlerin Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na hayvana bakar gibi bön bön bakacağı günleri de mi görecektik?"
languages.original_text: "Such humiliation for a Child of Asuryan, to be nothing but a beast for mon-keigh to gawp at."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighlerin Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na hayvana bakar gibi bön bön bakacağı günleri de mi görecektik?"
